chart.name: chart.total.hours.per.day
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.duration) AS _duration, self.project.fullName AS _project, self.date AS _day FROM TimesheetLine self WHERE self.timesheet.id= :id GROUP BY self.date, self.project.fullName ORDER BY self.date

chart.name: chart.leave.per.employee
chart.title: Leave Per Employee
chart.dataset: SELECT self.employee.name AS _employee, self.name AS _leave_reason, self.quantity AS _quantity FROM LeaveLine self WHERE self.employee.managerUser = :__user__ GROUP BY self.employee.name, self.name, self.quantity ORDER BY self.employee.name, self.name, self.quantity

chart.title: Expense Per Employee
chart.name: chart.expense.per.employee
chart.dataset: SELECT self.employee.name as _employee, SUM(self.inTaxTotal) as _amount FROM Expense self WHERE self.employee.managerUser = :__user__ AND self.period = :period GROUP BY self.employee.name ORDER BY self.employee.name
